  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ElementWiseOperator
    A base class for an arbitrary element-wise function that can be applied to a Matrix
    Functions
    A class to contain a small library of useful element-wise operators such as exponentiation, tanh, etc.
    Functions.ExpElementWiseOperator
    A child class of ElementWiseOperator, this class represents exponentiation to each element of a Matrix
    Functions.TanhElementWiseOperator
    A child class of ElementWiseOperator, this class represents tanh to each element of a Matrix
    Matrix
    The Matrix class which stores elements in a dense format.
    Matrix.Selector
     
    MatrixTester
     
    Shape
    A class to contain the pair (numRows, numCols) for a 2d matrix object (which can also be vectors) In the future I might expand this to allow for arbitrary dimensional matrices, but 2d for now
